text: Universal City Station (ユニバーサルシティ駅, ゆにばーさるしてぃえき) is a railway station of JR West in Konohana-ku, Osaka, Japan. == Adjacent stations == ;JR West : Sakurajima Line(Yumesaki Line) :: Ajikawaguchi Universal City - Sakurajima ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations in Osaka Prefecture
title: Universal City Station
